Game.Name: I Spy Challenger! (USA)
Game.plot: I Spy Challenger! is a Puzzle game, developed by Black Hammer Game and published by Scholastic, Inc., which was released in 2002.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/582404.htmlCheat: Advancing through levelsWhile you are in play, press start and go to the "code" entering screen, then enter the code.Cheat: Advancing through levelsType in this code on the name screen.
